comment.author: 55198937@N05
comment._content: Interesting to watch the sequence of development around Bondi Beach. Here from Powerhouse Museum c1900: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/powerhouse_museum/2363539264/in/photostream/] and here from Kerry c1906 (Powerhouse museum): www.powerhousemuseum.com/collection/database/?irn=426918&... and Sam Hood c1932 ( State Library NSW) acms.sl.nsw.gov.au/item/itemLarge.aspx?itemID=9890

comment.author: 70833291@N06
comment._content: Doesn't look like noon to me...

comment.author: 33147718@N05
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/angeljim46] Thanks Andy - its fascinating isn't it? We love the changes in fashion too - can you imagine a day at the beach in a suit and dress? How would you ever get all the sand out?!
